name: Random Vocab
author: Rakshith Vasudev

sections.description:
This plugin shows new words randomly at the admin’s dashboard page below the admin bar. Whats the big deal here? Well, you can learn new words on the go, while developing your cool website.

Right Now there are just 100 words,which will be updated.
This Plugin is pretty much based on Hello Dolly.

Words are taken from http://www.majortests.com/
sections.installation:
1. Upload Random-Vocab folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Before you want to ask anything please be aware that :
This Plugin is pretty much based on Hello Dolly. Words taken from http://www.majortests.com/
